review:
Game is horrendous. Fanbase is even worse. And the company is somehow worse than all that combined.

Stay far, FAR away from this game. It's just awful.
Go play Paladins or Team Fortress 2. both are free to play and FAR less exploitative towards it's players. And are just better games.

åˆ«çš„ä¸å¤šè¯´ï¼Œæš´é›ªåƒåœ¾æ¸¸æˆï¼Œæ—¥ä½ å¦ˆä»™äººï¼Œæ“ä½ å¦ˆçš„é€¼ï¼Œå¹²ä½ å¦ˆè¡€é€¼ï¼Œæ­»å…¨å®¶çš„æš´é›ªï¼Œæ“çš„ä½ å…¨å®¶ä»–å¦ˆæµç»¿æ°´ï¼Œæ“ä½ å¦ˆçš„è‡­é€¼

Waited patiently for a dedicated PvE mode since the original release of Uprising back in 2017. Waited for something more substantial than some walking targets with guns. I didn't actively wait of course, just had it in the back of my mind as I moved on to better games.

At the announcement that we'd all been lead on by the developers of the game, I can't say I was surprised in the slightest. Disappointed? Of course, I've been disappointed by things I didn't even have expectations for in the first place, companies finding ways to lower the bar is nothing new.

Decided to download this game one last time since I saw there was a free mission to try. The mission is a worse version of the original Uprising mission on Kings Row, complete with a downgraded 'defend an object from bombs slowly moving towards it' segment, an 'escort large object' segment, and a 'hack the terminal' segment. There's no background music during the mission, The characters never speak to each other during the mission, and it feels closer to a conceptual workshop game mode more than anything else it tried to be. Besides the omnics that could fly, the only new thing I noticed the null sector bots could do was jump over obstacles. 

And the PvP? Same issue. It's all a worse version of what it once was. 

Anyway, I'm gonna uninstall this game now. Not even in my worst nightmares could I imagine playing this god-awful PvP game for another minute.
This game is built on empty promises and lies

Overwatch 1 > Overwatch 2

We wanted full PVE coop mode, what we got is paid missions...
Blizzard literally has done everything to mess up with Overwatch 2.
I never thought I would think that Overwatch 1 Lootboxes were good, but since there is Overwatch 2, that is a reality.

Shame on everyone that made this game a total money grabber.

Day one player here with over 2000 hours since 2017, Yes Overwatch 1 was 1000 times better.. 
Yes Blizzard made some shitty decisions when it came to Ov2
Yes Blizzard went full money hungry for skins that used to be free
Yes The game is more toxic than Chernobyl on acid
Yes Blizzard expects you to grind 100 Hours to get anything unlocked for free
Yes They removed progression just to add progression
Yes they promised us PVE and did not give it to us
Yes the games skilled based matchmaking is broken
Yes some characters are so broken they can 1V5 a team
and Yes... I will still play this game for 100 more hours... Please help

Instead of worrying about adding mediocre dlc they should start worrying about all of the sexual abuse and atrocities against women in their company.

Being able to play OW on my steam deck is great and i love playing it but that does't excuse what a trash company u are blizzard, from the countless reviews and my own experience im sure i dont even need to go over what and when u messed up. from  a cheep AAA hero shooter i got when i was 13, to a cash grab joke of a game with more of a joke of a reputation.

ä¸ºä»€ä¹ˆè¦é—å¼ƒæˆ‘ä»¬çš„æ•°æ®?
When the game is no longer pure, when the game company is only focused on money, the feelings and affection of players will be reduced to ashes.

Don't play this game because Blizzard has no respect for you as a person and they want your money and only your money.

When they announced PVE everyone was so excited and couldn't wait to play it. Unfortunately for about 4 years they LIED to their entire player base saying we would have skill trees and re-playable missions and that it would be a FULL STORY EXPERIENCE! As you can now see from launch on steam, it is not a full story experience and it's there to grab your money for lackluster game play. If you're really curious about the story just watch a youtube video of someone else playing. It's not worth wasting your money on something so half-assed by the devs. 

The battle pass only serves as a way to try and get you to buy the new heroes when they come out and the skins are always not worth it in the end since half the time you won't be able to play your favorite heroes without getting countered by the enemy team. Not to mention that skins in Overwatch 1 used to be FREE and you could earn them yourself without spending so much as a dime. Now the skins are inflated to ridiculous prices that most people cannot afford. I'm talking $25-50 skins that they charge you for. IF you were to spend money on the game the ONLY thing worth it would be the battle pass but I would say it's still not worth it unless you really want to play the new hero ASAP.

The only good thing about the game is the PVP and even then it's only fun when you have competent teammates who actually try to play the game. But yes there is the issue of smurfs and also horrible matchmaking. The only thing worse than those 2 are the constant balance changes and "reworks" they do every month or so. Ruining your favorite heroes to play and eventually making them so different that you don't even want to play them or the game anymore.  Btw the "reworks" they do is only a fancy way of saying "let's change 1 or 2 abilities, ruin the core hero design and game play, and ultimately make them either broken or unplayable". Be careful, they'll rework anything that the majority of the player-base doesn't like!

Overall I would NOT invest my time into such a game like this ever again and will no longer be playing anything else Blizzard releases unless they get their act together and I suggest you do the same.

Blizzard ï¼Œ you mother is dieï¼Œfu*k you and your mother
we fu*k your mother together ï¼Œand you di*k is crashed
Boy, I sure hope someone got fired for that blunder!

I've played OW faithfully from 2016 to about 2018, yes the last time the game was relevant. If it wasn't the Devs eating their own @ss it was the Devs trying to do the impossible and balance a game where every character is different with widely different abilities, good luck. There favorite way of pursing balance and appease their MOST important player base which are OW leaguers is to ruin the game for literally everyone else because FU#k the other 90% right?

I assume this game came to Steam because the game is pretty rapidly approaching it's imminent death by design, this move has simply sped  up the clock. Lets quickly breeze through why I hate this game and will never recommend it in it's current state.
How dare you try to sell me story missions for $15! no less that were a promised and LONG delayed feature, the audacity to attempt to milk more money for delayed promised feature that should have been present since BEFORE OW 2 launched, you Blizzard Entertainment DO realized you only RELAUNCHED OVERWATCH 1 right? Nothing significant changed to even call this game OW 1.5.
How much do I enjoy when new characters launch and I have to grind through the despicable and tasteless battle pass to more than HALF way through to unlock this new character and actually use them, 80 battle pass levels and you must be BP level 45 to unlock. I won't even bother getting into the endless other reasons why this game and it's studio are one of the same.  Ridiculous, Greed and has no place in modern society. I give this game 48 hours from August 10th 2023 to hit Overwhelmingly Negative.
